DeployR Licensing

Version 8.1.0

DeployR Server

Free Software Foundation's GNU AGPL v3.0.

Commercial licenses are also available from Microsoft Corporation.

Client Libraries

DeployR supported client libraries and RBroker Framework: Apache License v2.0.

Licensing Policy

The goal of the server license is to require that enhancements to DeployR Server be released to the community.

To make the above practical, we promise that your client application which uses the DeployR Server is a separate work. To facilitate this, the DeployR supported client libraries and RBroker Framework (the part you link with your application) are released under Apache license, which is copyleft free.

If the above isn't enough to satisfy your organization, please contact Microsoft Corporation to obtain a commercial license.
